name: Freakyforms™ Your Creations, Alive!
description: The updated version of Freakyforms ensures formee exchange compatibility with the retail software Freakyforms Deluxe. All body parts will now be transferred and displayed correctly. If you downloaded or updated this software after July 28th, you already have the newest version. Introducing Freakyforms, where your imagination literally runs wild! Create weird and wonderful creatures called “formees”, bring them to life, and explore your own planet packed with discoveries. Have fun creating and playing with your formees, unlock new body parts, take part in challenges and even change the look of your planet to suit your style. Snap 3D photos of your favourite creations and use StreetPass to send and receive formees wirelessly – for endless Freakyforms fun!
